posts.post_content:
It's been quite a while since I have picked up any new Obaks for my collection:

Here are a few I am still looking to purchase:

Seeking the following T212-2 1910 Obaks:

Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
 
Seeking the following T212-3 1911 Obaks:

Tom Hasty, Spokane, N.W.L.
Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
William Pearce, Oakland, PC.L.

I will pay well for nice condition examples.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
